sourcesContent: import{z as o}from"zod";import{LegacyInvalidInputError as e,PrivyErrorCode as r}from"@privy-io/api-base";import{BaseAccountTransferInput as t}from"./account-transfer.mjs";import{PasswordlessCode as n,PhoneNumber as m,AuthenticateMode as c}from"./core.mjs";import"bs58";import"ethers";import"libphonenumber-js/max";const p=o.object({code:n.catch((()=>{throw new e("Invalid SMS verification code",r.INVALID_CREDENTIALS)})),phoneNumber:m.catch((()=>{throw new e("Invalid phone number",r.INVALID_CREDENTIALS)}))}),i=p.merge(c),b=o.object({phoneNumber:m.catch((()=>{throw new e("Invalid phone number, not formatted correctly",r.INVALID_DATA)})),token:o.string().optional()}),h=o.object({phoneNumber:m}),a=o.object({old_phone_number:m,new_phone_number:m,code:n}),I=t.extend({phoneNumber:m});export{i as AuthenticatePhoneInput,b as PasswordlessSmsPhoneInput,I as TransferPhoneInput,h as UnlinkPhoneInput,a as UpdatePhoneInput,p as VerifyPhoneInput};
